data.name: Death in the Water 2
data.detailed_description:
Beware the waters, they hide a mysterious and terrifying threat in this tense underwater horror survival game.
Death, an ancient Kraken leviathan of the deep, haunts your every move. Fight to survive using powerful weapons and upgrades as you explore a beautiful yet treacherous underwater world.

We have an extensive list of incredibly lifelike procedurally animated creatures, both real and fantasy-based with even more to come:



  • Great White Shark
  • Sand Tiger Shark
  • Mako Shark
  • Bull Shark
  • Blacktip Reef Shark
  • Lionfish
  • Leopard Moray Eel & Yellow Moray Eel
  • Coral Reef & Yellow-Bellied Sea Snakes
  • Dolphins
  • Sirens
  • Hydra
  • Kraken

About the Dev Team

We are two friends Neil (the artist) and Edward (the coder), we started making games as a hobby back when we were still in school. Thirteen years ago we quit our day jobs and went on to found Lighthouse Games Studio and have released multiple top selling games including Shark Attack Deathmatch, Comedy Night, Avatar Deathmatch, and many others.

Social Links

You can follow us on Twitter | YouTube | TikTok for daily updates on the progress of the game!

data.short_description: Dodge and carve your way through swarms of terrifying sea creatures controlled by Death, a vicious giant mind-controlling Kraken that haunts your every move. Scavenge for hidden treasure to unlock weapons, and upgrades to help you in your fight for survival. Every dive reveals a new nightmare.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish

Minimum:

  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7 / 64-Bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670 / GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectXÂ®-compatible
